longBusinessSummary: Somi Conveyor Beltings Limited manufactures and sells industrial conveyor belts in India. The company offers general purpose, heat resistance, fire resistance, oil resistance, and steel cord conveyor belts; and bullet proof, combination of fabric belt and steel wires, chevron, rough top, and pipe conveyor belts. It serves cement, sponge iron, power, and mining sectors. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Jodhpur, India.
